reviewText: Tim Allen is great in this show and it had a good run in the 1990's.Get all of the seasons and watch them in order to see the growth of everyone in them.
Title: Home Improvement: Season 7

reviewText: The 7th Season of Home Improvement continues the great comedy of Tim Allen and crew.  This is one of our all-time favorite series, and Season 7 is on par with the rest.  Video transfer quality is great, sound is great, content is great.  We've enjoyed this tremendously and will watch again in years to come.
Title: Home Improvement: Season 7

reviewerName: Don't tread on me "Defending the Conservative...
reviewText: Home Improvement, by far, has to be one of my all time favorite TV shows.  Tim Allen had a good thing with the show.  I wish he would have done another season or two instead of moving on to some of the worthless movies that he did (i.e Shaggy Dog).However, the show was concluded very nicely which this set obviously includes.  If you were a fan of the show, this is a must have.  The shows are in their full length, uncut versions instead of the trimed down version that you see in syndication.I have to say one of my favorite aspects of season seven was the departure of that annoying brat, Jonathon Taylor Thomas.  His ultra-liberal ways and stupid comments were really beginning to get on my nerves.  Even Tim Allen has admitted that he wanted him off the set.  Good riddance to JTT.I would have liked to see Tim finally win the Christmas contest in the last season.....
Title: Home Improvement: Season 7

reviewText: The Tim Allen series "Home Improvement" was one of the longest running half-hour television series during the 90's on ABC.  Buena Vista Home Entertainment has released "Home Improvement-The Complete Seventh Series" on DVD.  The three disc DVD includes all 25 episodes from the shows 7th season.Fans of the show will recall that Tim Allen starred in the series as the host of his own television series named "Tool Time." In addition to a busy and laughter filled career, he also raised his family with his wife who was portrayed by actress Patricia Richardson.  There are plenty of funny episodes during the shows 7th season, but fans of the series' may mark their rememberance of this season with the fact that this was the season that Tim considered leaving "Tool Time" for good.  Guest stars include Grant Hill and Dan Akroyd.  Bonus features include Season 7 Bloopers.
Title: Home Improvement: Season 7

reviewText: We want Season 8, we want Season 8One of my all time favorites, absolutely hilariousDid i mention where season 8 was?
Title: Home Improvement: Season 7

reviewText: Home Improvement TV series continues to bring lots of laughs. If you have enjoyed the past seasons of this TV show you will definely keep laughing. If you are alwasy curious of what sorts of stunts and acts that Tim Allen pulls sometimes at the expense of Al or himself you are in for a treat. This season is great. While you will notice some of the same things that have always made the show a success you will be pleasently surprised with new and improved pranks and stunts. I would highly recommend it to any Home Improvement fan!!
Title: Home Improvement: Season 7

reviewText: As in previous seasons, Tim delights our whole family with laughter, as he continues to power up power tools with disastrous results and teaches us about relationships. Hubby and I love re-watching this family-friendly show with our kids. By now we've come to know Tim's family closely, seen his three boys grow up. Only one more season left! Fortunately for Tim Allen fans, another show named "Last Man Standing" is currently in its third season, this time Tim has three daughters
Title: Home Improvement: Season 7

reviewText: The 7th season of this series is, along with the rest, funny, touching, and fantastic. A series worth having on hand to watch when there is nothing on TV. Quality programming. Wish TV programming would return to stuff like this.
Title: Home Improvement: Season 7

reviewText: The series is great. All the actors act great, the "big ones", the "extras". The stories always are great. The show even improved from season to season: great entertainment.I hope, that the complete show will be available on dvd soon... with ALL seasons, including the end.Walter Joerg Langbein, Germany
Title: Home Improvement: Season 7

reviewText: We loved this series and hated to see it end. This was a great family comedy and we really enjoyed all 7 seasons.
